[00:00.00]Close To Me - Ellie Goulding (埃利·古尔丁)/Diplo (迪波洛)/Swae Lee
[00:01.10]Ellie Goulding：
[00:06.22]Even though we both know we're liars and we start each other's fires
[00:09.92]We just know that we'll be alright
[00:12.88]Even though we're kicked out the party 'cause we both hate everybody
[00:16.59]We're the ones they wanna be like
[00:19.87]So don't let me down
[00:23.66]Keep me in trouble
[00:27.09]Born to be wild
[00:30.38]Out in the jungle
[00:33.35]Ellie Goulding/Swae Lee：
[00:34.38]And I don't wanna be somebody without your body
[00:38.60]Close to me
[00:41.06]And if it wasn't you
[00:42.31]I wouldn't want anybody
[00:45.32]Close to me
[00:47.56]Yeah yeah
[00:48.24]'Cause I'm an animal animal-al
[00:51.61]Like animal like you

[00:58.61]Close to me
